about_the_game:
Ne no Kami - The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto Artbook contains illustrations, design work and other information about the Ne no Kami universe. Featuring the designs of character designer, Hatachi, dive into the lore of this yuri franchise.

Features

  • 72 pages of content including over 30 pages in full color.
  • Includes a mini manga illustrated by bokkun
  • Includes a mini light novel featuring characters from the franchise

content_descriptors.notes: Contains explicit CGs from the erotic scenes without mosaic as well as nude sprites.
